personal.name: Gaëtan Staquet
personal.position: PhD Student in Theoretical Computer Science
personal.organization: F.R.S.-FNRS, University of Mons, University of Antwerp

summary:
I am a Research Fellow (PhD student) at the F.R.S.-FNRS, co-supervised by Véronique Bruyère (UMONS) and Guillermo A. Pérez (UAntwerpen).

My research interests include (and are not limited to):

  * Automata theory,
  * Active and passive automata learning,
  * Timed automata,
  * Formal verification,
  * Game theory.

A PDF version of this resume is available [here](gaetan_staquet.pdf).

address.street: Bâtiment De Vinci, Avenue Victor Maistriau, 15
